verses.name: Jeremiah 4:1
verses.text: If thou wilt return, O Israel, saith the Lord, return unto me: and if thou wilt put away thine abominations out of my sight, then shalt thou not remove.

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:2
verses.text: And thou shalt swear, The Lord liveth, in truth, in judgment, and in righteousness; and the nations shall bless themselves in him, and in him shall they glory.

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:3
verses.text: For thus saith the Lord to the men of Judah and Jerusalem, Break up your fallow ground, and sow not among thorns.
